title: Are the actors on Saturday Night Live all paid about the same amount?

og.title: Are the actors on Saturday Night Live all paid about the same amount?
og.description: Answer (1 of 7): In the first season of the show, cast were paid $750 per episode, rising to $2,000 by season two, and $4,000 by season four. By the late 1990s, new cast members received a salary between $5,000 and $5,500 per episode, increasing to $6,000 in the second year and up to $12,500 for ...
